reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater looks exactly as pictured and appreciate its softness and good fit.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute bow snap up sweater.
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater. I've had a difficult time finding a bow type sweater like this that would fit and not look awkward on as I'm large chested until I found this sweater. I bought and XXL and it looks great. Not too tight and doesn't gap in the chest area. It is soft, warm and looks exactly as pictured. Read more
items.author: Jenny Rae

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: What a pretty sweater. I don't normally buy brown, but love this sweater with the black bows. I ordered my regular size and it fits well, a little loose, but not overly so, comfortable. Surprised with the quality, and feel it will wash & hang dry well. The bows are a velour feel and thin with snap closure, so I'm careful when snapping and unsnapping so I don't "mess" up the bows. Read more
items.author: harborwife253 aka Ooma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it !
items.body: Is well made, comfy .. looks amazing Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater but not for me
items.body: This is a nice soft sweater that is beautifully made but it just didn’t fit me quite right so I returned it. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable cardigan
items.body: Absolutely love this cardigan! The material is great, the bows are adorable, and it’s such a good find. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can be dressed up or worn casual.
items.body: Another adorable sweater that can be worn with leggings. I am pairing it with a pair of cropped faux, leather pants and heels, and it looks fabulous. After removing it from its heat sealed package, I gave it a quick steam straightened out the bows and it was ready to go. Read more
items.author: Loving Texas

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bows are Beautiful!
items.body: Pretty sweater. Heavier in weight than I expected but that’s probably because in Los Angeles one doesn’t need heavy sweaters. The bows are a nice touch. I will be keeping the sweater. I ordered a size large and it fits according to the chart. Read more
items.author: just another student

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You’ll love this cardigan!
items.body: This bow cardigan is so adorable! Have worn it twice and received many compliments. The cardigan is soft, and I’m going to order another color. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Blue, Red, Brown, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Blue, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
